sentence.text: No formal drug interaction studies have been conducted with DOXIL .
sentence.negationtags: <scope> <cue> No </cue> formal drug interaction studies have been conducted with DOXIL </scope> .

sentence.text: Until specific compatibility data are available, it is not recommended that DOXIL be mixed with other drugs.
sentence.negationtags: Until specific compatibility data are available, it is <scope> <cue> not </cue> recommended that DOXIL be mixed with other drugs. </scope>

sentence.text: DOXIL may interact with drugs known to interact with the conventional formulation of doxorubicin HCl.
